Federal Government College, Billiri bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ Federal Unity Colleges dị na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị etiti nwere, nke Federal Ministry of Education, Nigeria na-elekọta
Ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị dị na Billiri, Gombe State, Nigeria
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ugbu a bụ Ibrahim Abna
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ezigbo mma na ebe mmụta iji gboo mkpa agụmakwụkwọ n'agbanyeghị na ọ dị mkpa imeziwanye ebe a na-akọ na ha nwere nsonaazụ n'ule WAEC kacha njọ ọtụtụ afọ
